name: Insight: Dinosaurs
overview: It's been 65 million years! Amiga CDTV/CD32 multimedia CD-ROM on the topic of dinosaurs shows you in a fun but educational way what life may have been like in the time of the giants. Insight DINOSAURS is the second in the 'INSIGHT series for CD32, CDTV and A570 owners. Produced in association with The Natural History Museum, London and featuring the work of world renowned Dinosaur illustrators. Lavishly produced with photos, illustrations, computer graphics, motion video, text, narration and sound effects, this unique title brings to life these long dead giants of the past. Dinosaur A-Z, Death of the Dinosaur, Anatomy, Attack & Defense, Carnivores, Herbivores, Shifting Continents, Climate, Fossil Hunters, Fossil Hunting, Timeline, Family Tree and Funosaurus which includes quiz, Chinese puzzler and paint book. Fun and facts for ALL the family! Royalties in aid of The Natural History Museum's research into improving the environment
